4.title: Tapering Off

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: At this stage in treatment, Dr. Drew and his staff begin to reduce the patients' detox medications, which causes them to become agitated and emotional.

5.title: Anger Management

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Eric and Ashleigh's fight from the hike continues back on the unit. Jasmen's denial about the severity of her addiction upsets the patients, and when Erika confronts her, it starts a war that threatens to divide the group.

6.title: The Halfway Point

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: As the patients approach the halfway point, many are doing much better, but for some the hardest part is yet to come. Drewbee's paranoia gets the best of him and he's nearly discharged for breaking the rules. Presented by VH1.

7.title: Things Get Worse Before They Get Better

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Lead Counselor Bob Forrest finds Eric walking aimlessly through the streets of Pasadena, and he convinces him to return back to the unit. A field trip meant to inspire the patients ends in a medical emergency.

8.title: Facing the Past

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Ashleigh's seizure continues and she's rushed to the hospital in an ambulance. Deanna opens up about some horrible trauma in her past, inspiring another patient to finally reveal a secret she's been holding in since she was a child.

9.title: Family Weekend

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Dr. Drew reunites the patients with their families. Ashleigh and her sister Holly reveal to their mother a painful secret both have been harboring for decades. Dr. Drew is stunned to learn that Jasmen doesn't intend to go to sober living.

10.title: Preparing for the Real World

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Outside the recovery center, Dr. Drew heads off Drewbee and convinces the troubled addict to return to treatment. Erika's boyfriend Stefanos calls the center intoxicated and Erika realizes she must make a difficult choice.

11.title: Graduation

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: With graduation looming, tensions on the unit reach a boiling point. In a heartfelt graduation, Dr. Drew and the patients give their hopes, wishes and fears as this journey comes to an end.

1.title: Intake

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: On the series premiere, eight drug addicted celebrities check themselves into rehab under the care of Dr. Drew Pinsky and begin their difficult battle for sobriety.

2.title: Detox

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: As the treatment process begins, all of the patients are experiencing intense physical withdrawal symptoms, but none more than Ashleigh. Later, the three remaining patients arrive.

3.title: New Arrival

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Jeff finally returns from the hospital, but while he continues to detox, Drew lectures Jeff's co-dependant girlfriend about her own bad habits will kill Jeff.

4.title: Sex and Trauma

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Dr. Drew let's Celebs in Rehab have a fun BBQ and see their friends and guests. Mary Carey invites her friend Rena Riffel (Showgirls/Striptease) and they talk with Jeff Conaway. Rena leaves early, and a wet t-shirt contest goes bad.

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

6.title: Friends and Family

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: After threatening many times during his stay at rehab to leave, Jeff renews his quest to quit.

7.title: Retreat

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: The end of rehab is now VERY near and rehabbers must seriously start making plans for sober living.

8.title: The Disease Is Winning

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: After the Catalina fiasco and food fight, Dr. Drew is fed up -- he's melting down

9.title: Graduation

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: After weeks of detox, withdrawal, therapy and healing, it is graduation time. With the news that sober living will be provided free of charge, the cast struggles with the decision to continue treatment after rehab, or to go home and face temptation.

10.title: The Reunion

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Dr. Drew reunites several of his celebrity rehab patients to find out what happened after they left treatment.

1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Addiction specialist Dr. Drew returns for a second season of Celebrity Rehab to once again face the challenges of helping the famous and the infamous in their efforts to overcome their addictions and regain control of their lives.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Dr. Drew's patients have only recently checked in to Celebrity Rehab, but there is already a major predicament.

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: It's day four of Celebrity Rehab and the patients have finally begun to emerge from the painful sickness of withdrawal.

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: As the midpoint of Celebrity Rehab 2 draws near, the patients at Pasadena Recovery Center are going to start facing tough emotional issues while they explore what is behind their addictive behavior.

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: In his most desperate act yet, Jeff Conaway has called 911 and informed the authorities that he's being held against his will.

6.title: Episode #2.6

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: It is now the halfway point in treatment and itÂ's time for Family Weekend!!Â As the patients move into the next stage of treatment, they begin to focus on how to take action to move forward in their recovery.

7.title: Episode #2.7

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: It's day fifteen at rehab, and the patients are starting to feel better; more vibrant and alive.

8.title: Episode #2.8

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: It's day 18 of Celebrity Rehab and the patients are getting a first hand look of what relapse is all about.

9.title: Episode #2.9

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: It's day 19 of Celebrity rehab, and graduation is just around the corner. The patients have just enjoyed an evening out at a comedy club, and are returning back to the PRC.

1.title: Intake

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: As the patients check in, Dr. Drew first lands them at the Pasadena Recovery Center, and then meets with them individually to examine the role that their addictions play in their lives.

2.title: Detox

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Dr. Drew's patients are just beginning the treatment process, and as many of them are life-long drug users, the physical effects of detox are severe for many of the addicts.

3.title: Dealing with the Past

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: While the detox process is painful and difficult for all the patients, most are making it through without complications, until Mindy McCready suffers an intense seizure and is taken to the hospital.

4.title: New Patients

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: As the first week of treatment comes to an end, Tom begrudgingly decides to return to the Pasadena Recovery Center, followed by his girlfriend Monroe, who is suspected of having brought drugs onto the unit.

5.title: Loss

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Kari Ann Peniche arrives at the Pasadena Recovery Center to begin treatment, and it's not long before her demanding personality offends the other patients.

6.title: Triggers

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Past alumni successes from Celebrity Rehab return to encourage the patients to remain sober. The visit proves successful, as recovering alcoholic Brigitte Nielsen helps Dennis come to terms with his own alcoholism.

7.title: Family Weekend

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Dr. Drew invites the addicts and their families to a lake house for a group session to discuss the importance loved ones play in the recovery process.

8.title: Acting Out

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: As rehab nears an end, the patients become apprehensive about their ability to stay sober outside the safety of rehab, and many wrestle with the idea of continuing their journey in sober living.

9.title: Graduation

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Kari Ann returns to treatment, and at the final process group patients write emotional goodbye letters to their addictions and consider if they will continue on in sober living or not.

1.title: Episode #4.1

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: As the patients check in, Dr. Drew first lands them at the Pasadena Recovery Center, then meets with them individually to examine the role that their addictions play in their lives.

2.title: Episode #4.2

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Dr. Drew's patients are just beginning the treatment process, and as many of them are life-long drug users, the physical effects of detox are severe for many of the addicts.

3.title: Episode #4.3

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Jeremy London and his wife Melissa reunite while sober for the first time to discuss their son and Jason Davis comes to terms with some painful revelations about his past. Word leaks to the press that Rachel Utichel is in Rehab.

4.title: Withdrawals

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: As the first week of treatment comes to an end, many of the patients' withdrawal symptoms cause them to be agitated and hypersensitive toward one another. Bickering between Janice and Rachel comes to a head.

5.title: Episode #4.5

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: After Rachel's departure from treatment everyone urges her to return except for Janice, whose harsh judgement of Rachel isolates her from the group, and ultimately leads to a severe panic attack.

6.title: Episode #4.6

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Reaching the half way point in treatment, the patients become aware of the damage drugs have done to their loved ones. Jason Davis and Jason Wahler scheme to escape the unit but their plans backfire and police are involved.

7.title: Episode #4.7

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Dr. Drew invites the addicts and their families to a lake house retreat to discuss the importance loved ones play in the recovery process and on an outing in Hollywood, Leif Garrett challenges authority and nearly relapses.

8.title: Episode #4.8

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Dr. Drew confronts Leif Garrett regarding his near relapse. Jeremy London learns a painful secret that threatens to destroy his marriage.

9.title: Episode #4.9

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: As graduation approaches, Dr. Drew and his staff check in with the patients to discuss their aftercare plans and the patients pay an emotional visit to a family that has been destroyed by drugs.

10.title: Episode #4.10

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: At the graduation ceremony, Dr. Drew speaks to everyone and their loved ones to congratulate them for successfully completing treatment.

11.title: Reunion

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot:

1.title: Intake

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Addiction specialist Dr. Drew returns for a fifth season of Celebrity Rehab to once again face the intense task of helping a new group of celebrity patients in their quest for sobriety.

2.title: Detox

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: As the treatment process begins, a new patient, famous Major League Baseball pitcher Dwight "Doc" Gooden enrolls in rehab for a lifelong addiction to cocaine and Ambien. Amy Fisher's traumatic relationship with the media is triggered by the production's cameras, and she lashes out at the crew and nearly quits rehab. Actress Bai Ling refuses to take psychiatric medication that Dr. Drew has prescribed, and she ends up hiding from the staff and climbing on the roof of the Pasadena Recovery Center. Bai's intentions are unclear, but the staff is very concerned that she ...

3.title: Awakening Emotions

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Steven Adler continues his relentless and abusive verbal attack on Amy Fisher for her refusal to identify as an addict, and when he gives Dr. Drew the ultimatum "It's either her or me!", it appears as though Steven may abandon his treatment. Dwight Gooden struggles with painful feelings of guilt over the way he's neglected his children for drugs, and he makes an emotional apology to his oldest son. The patients get a somber visit from a family who has lost a child to addiction.

4.title: Triggers and Regret

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Steven Adler continues his relentless and abusive verbal attack on Amy Fisher for her refusal to identify as an addict. When he gives Dr. Drew the ultimatum "It's either her or me!", it appears Steven may abandon his treatment.

5.title: Wreckage from the Past

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Bai Ling becomes hysterical during an emotional process group, and later Dr. Drew discovers that she suffered horrible abuse at the hands of Chinese military generals when she was very young. Michael Lohan's ex fiancée Kate Major calls the unit repeatedly while under the influence, and although it's clearly disrupting his treatment, Michael insists that Kate attend Family Weekend and almost abandons his treatment when the staff puts a condition on her attendance. The patients pay an emotional visit to a non-profit organization that provides treatment and hope to ...

6.title: Family Weekend

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Dr. Drew reunites the patients and their families at Pasadena City Hall to discuss the importance loved ones play in the recovery process.

7.title: The Trouble with Loved Ones

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Amy and her husband Lou meet with Dr. Drew to discuss her adult film career, and Michael Lohan has an explosive argument with Kate Major that nearly gives him a heart attack, and almost gets him arrested.

8.title: Preparing for Discharge

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: As graduation approaches, Dr. Drew and his staff check in with the patients to discuss their aftercare plans and to help them make their home environments safe.

9.title: Graduation

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: The patients have one final process group where they discuss concerns about one another. Celebrity alumni from season four pay a visit to the Pasadena Recovery Center to share words of wisdom and encouragement.

10.title: Season 5 Revisited: Part 1

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Dr. Drew and his head counselor Bob Forrest look back on season five and visit with former patients to see where they are now in their fight for sobriety.

11.title: Season 5 Revisited: Part 2

episode of.title: Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Dr. Drew and his head counselor Bob Forrest look back on season five and visit with former patients to see where they are now in their fight for sobriety.

plot: Eight celebrities check into rehab under Dr. Drew for 21 days.::Anonymous
